login.login_msg_2: Start creating short links with superpowers
login.no_account: No account found with that email address.

workspace.question: What is a workspace?
workspace.name: Workspace Name
workspace.tooltip: This is your workspace's unique slug on
workspace.migrate: links have been migrated to a custom workspace.
workspace.not_found_desc:
Bummer! The workspace you are looking for does not exist. You either 
 typed in the wrong URL or don't have access to this workspace.
workspace.dont_have: You don't have any workspaces yet!
workspace.delete_desc:
Permanently delete your workspace, custom domain, and all associated 
 links + their stats. This action cannot be undone - please proceed 
 with caution.
workspace.only_owner: Only workspace owners can delete a workspace.

link.enter_link: Enter a link to generate a preview.
link.too_long: Short links longer than 25 characters will show up differently on some platforms.
link.bummer:
Bummer! The link you are looking for does not exist. You either typed 
 in the wrong URL or don't have access to this link.

account.delete_desc_p2:
account, 
 all of your workspaces, links and their respective stats. This action 
 cannot be undone - please proceed with caution.

settings.this_avatar: This is your avatar image on
settings.size_notice:
Square image recommended. Accepted file types: .png, .jpg. Max file 
size: 2MB.
settings.this_logo: This is your workspace's logo on
settings.is_owner: Only workspace owners can change the workspace logo.

tokens.enter_key: Enter a unique name for your API key to differentiate it from other keys.
tokens.description:
These API keys allow other apps to access your account. Use it with 
 caution – do not share your API key with others, or expose it in the 
 browser or other client-side code
tokens.name: Name
tokens.no_api_key: No API keys found. Create one above.
tokens.display_name: This will be your display name on

banned.banned_desc: This link has been banned for violating our terms of service.

expired.expired_desc:
This link has expired. Please contact the owner of this link to get a 
 new one.

password.description: This link is password protected. Please enter the password to view it.

analytics.no_data_download: There's no data available for download. Try adjusting your filter or date range settings.
analytics.stat_desc:
Making stats public will allow anyone with the link to see the 
 stats for this short link.
analytics.no_tag: No tags found in this workspace

help.get_back: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
help.cant_find: Can't find what you're looking for?
help.send_message:
Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as 
 possible.

modal.invited: You've been invited to join and collaborate on the
modal.workspace_invalid: This invite has expired or is no longer valid.
modal.use_tag: Use tags to organize your links.
modal.fail_to_rollback: Failed to roll back changes. An error occurred.
modal.unarchive_desc: By unarchiving this link, it will show up on your main dashboard again.
modal.archive_desc: Archived links will still work - they just won't show up on your main dashboard.
modal.delete_desc:
Warning: Deleting this link will remove all of its analytics. This 
 action cannot be undone – proceed with caution.
modal.delete_api_desc:
This will permanently delete the API key for and revoke all access to 
 your account. Are you sure you want to continue?
modal.delete_workspace_desc:
Warning: This will permanently delete your workspace, custom domain, 
 and all associated links and their respective stats
modal.change_role_desc_4:
Are you sure you want to 
 continue?
modal.google_desc_1: This allows you to sign in to your
modal.copied: Copied QR code URL to clipboard!
modal.update_qr: How to update my QR Code logo?
modal.lose_access: . You will lose all access to this workspace.
modal.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to continue?
modal.api_key_created_desc:
For security reasons, we will only show you the key once. Please copy 
 and store it somewhere safe.
modal.transfer_desc_1: Transfer this link and its analytics to another
modal.transfer_desc_2: workspace. Link tags will not be transferred.
